DOC.brief_summary: The study aim assess effect functional balance Otago exercise perform home exercise versus group exercise . The investigator hypothesize Otago exercise effective perform group exercise home exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Otago Programme Delivered Home Exercise Group Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: The study sample drawn person refer fall outpatient clinic . Group exercise home exercise deliver trained physiotherapist . Home exercise follow original Otago exercise protocol . Group exercise perform twice week . The length intervention period 3 month . The main outcome measure Berg Balance Scale .
DOC.criteria: referred outpatient fall clinic fallen previous year gait balance problem Mini Mental Status Examination ( MMSE ) < 22 Not able walk 10 without support another person
